Class CryptogramGUIView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
view.CryptogramGUIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class CryptogramGUIView extends javafx.application.Application implements Observer
The main GUI view for the Cryptogram game application. This class creates and manages the user interface for playing cryptogram puzzles, including the encrypted text display, user input fields, and control buttons.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Your Name

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Initializes and displays the main application window. Sets up the model, controller, and all UI components.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • buildGridPlane

      public void buildGridPlane()
      Builds the grid pane containing the cryptogram puzzle. Creates text fields for user input and labels for encrypted characters. Arranges elements in rows of up to 30 characters each.

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, Object arg)
      Updates the view when the model changes. Refreshes all text fields with the current decryption progress. This method is called automatically when the Observable model notifies observers.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      o - The Observable object (the model)
      arg - An optional argument passed by the Observable
